text: Louis Johnson Jr. (born December 27, 1987), better known by his stage name King Louie (or King L), is an American rapper. He is from Chicago, Illinois. He is signed to the record label Epic Records. King L collaborated with the likes of 2 Chainz, Chief Keef, Lil Durk, Lil Bibby, and Kanye West. ==Discography== ===Mixtapes=== * #ManUpBandUp (2010) * The Motion Picture (2011) * Chiraq Drillinois (2011) * #ManUpBandUp2 (2011) * Showtime (2012) * Drilluminati (2012) * March Madness (2013) * Jeep Music (2013) * Drilluminati 2 (2013) ==References== ==Other websites== * King L Official Website * King L On The Interview Show - Huffington Post * Studio Footage of King L on Fake Shore Drive Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Rappers from Illinois Category:Musicians from Chicago Category:21st-century American rappers Category:American songwriters
title: King L
